channel.title: India News on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in India News on NewsStreet

item.title: Maharashtra : School bus falls into gorge in Raigad, 7 including children injured
item.description: Maharashtra : School bus falls into gorge in Raigad, 7 including children injured The police squad arrived at the scene as soon as the tragedy was reported, and with the assistance of locals, they transported the injured to the hospital.

item.title: Ban Drishti IAS: Coaching teacher’s take on Lord Rama and Sita offends people, leaves Twitter divided
item.description: Ban Drishti IAS: Coaching teacher’s take on Lord Rama and Sita offends people, leaves Twitter divided Drishti IAS is a civil services coaching centre in New Delhi that provided guidance to prepare exams conducted by UPSC.
